snippet: Ted Karadenes is 67 and shares a one-bedroom apartment with two other men, subsisting on catering work and federal benefits. For his retirement, he plans to play music in subway stations.
abstract: Selfhelp Community Services, a beneficiary agency of UJA-Federation of New York and one of seven charities supported by The New York Times Neediest Cases Fund, provides funds to Vietnam veteran Ted Karadenes to purchase an air conditioner for his Queens apartment.
lead_paragraph: Ted Karadenes is 67 and shares a one-bedroom apartment with two other men, subsisting on catering work and federal benefits. For his retirement, he plans to play music in subway stations.

headline.main: The Custodian of the Song in His Heart
headline.print_headline: The Custodian of the Song in His Heart
